page.title: 08JAMES'SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I get to school at about 8.45 and go in to get the whistle.It is my job to blow the whistle and ring the bell at playtimes and dinner time. At 9.00 I blow the whistle and we go in to start 'DD'.Mr. Hurrell calls the register then we mark 'DD', I usually get 9 or 10.We then do core maths or language until assembly time.Mrs.Sampson's class took assembly today, they did about Moses and the 10 commandments. After break I started writing this for the Domesday Survey. It was games on the field after dinner.We had scoring rounders,{ {Supersquad }against{Hotshots. }I play for Hotshots and we won {48 - 35. After break I carried on writing this until I rung the bell for hometime at 3.45.
